title: FPS Drop / Game recorder
body:
I know there's already a lot of Discussions about Game recording software. 

However, I didn't find what I was looking for.

Whenever I try to record, my FPS drops at 1. Anyone got an idea why ? or a solution ?

Thanks !

replies.body: The replay recorder itself shouldn't be causing huge fps strains but could be to victim of optimized settings, outdated drivers, or bad game files.  To start, I suggest closing any non-essential background apps or lowering video settings in-game.  If the issue persists, go over the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help tune things up.  Let me know if those steps help!
